input.sentences: the women 's basketball team were competing for the national championship .
just right before the game | the men received their trophies .
this gave motivation for the women to compete harder than they ever did during the season .
they eventually lost the game to the other team .

output.sentences: The women's basketball team played against their rival team.
They won the conference for the season, and won many trophies.
The following season, they returned to play against the rival team.
Their fans were disappointed, and lost their faith in the team.
